column5: Need a head count to make reservations for Saturday night in Picton.  JJ's Texas Grill, 105 Main Street BLOOMFIELD, ON K0K 1G0 Phone: 613-393-1727 and boy do they know how to cook a steak.  Also has a big screen TV if there's any sports on.  You's guys over at Perfect Vu could probably pony up a few bucks and share a minivan taxi if you're worried about driving.  Just a thought.  So who's coming?  Were already at 8 from the other thread so add a number if you're coming or might come if a DD or Taxi can take you.  Somebody needs to take this dang trophy from cluttering up our den
Lloyd, Terry, Jose, Paul and myself = 5  Joey, Paul and Roy = 8
Is there nobody else going to BOQ this weekend that wants to do supper???
I just needed to talk to the guys. We will be there. 4 guys that eat steak. Now, I see the address but were is that?  Safe Fishing First, Jack
105 main street, Bloomfield, just outside of Picton.  Joey

Okay, I called and made reservations under OFC or Joey.  It is 105 Main Street, Bloomfield.  She says they have a killer band playing that night too so that will be nice.  Just Google the map, its just outside of Picton, about 5 - 10 minute drive.  Joey

I'm fishing with a group out of West Lake Willows (of whom I have never met any   ) this weekend. It looks like JJ's is not far from there so I wouldn't mind trying to meet up to shake some hands and put some faces to names. It would be post dinner though.  Regards, Pikeslayer

Sounds like a great time!!!!.......I am really going to try and join next year now that I have a Quinte water worthy ride!!!  Have fun everyone....Saturday may see some rough seas but Sunday looks much better!!!  http://www.windfinder.com/forecast/adolphustown  http://www.windguru.cz/int/index.php?go=1&lang=eng&vs=1&sc=298&wj=kmh&tj=c&odh=3&doh=22&fhours=180
It might be -1 now Hun... I'll let you know as soon as I can.
I hope not hon, you can go back Sunday no?
